content.value:
I think that I just accidentally wrote most of a node-based endpoint discovery, parser, and sender for webmentions.

I think a version already exists in npm, but would it be useful for other `#indieweb` folk to have this as a package? S'all async and promises.
content.html: I think that I just accidentally wrote most of a node-based endpoint discovery, parser, and sender for webmentions. I think a version already exists in npm, but would it be useful for other `#indieweb` folk to have this as a package? S'all async and promises.
